Cade
A cycle-accurate DCPU-16 emulator, written in C.

Detailed Description

Internal representation of the state of the emulated CPU.

Field Documentation

Thunk DCPU_State::cycle

Function to execute for next clock cycle.

uint16_t DCPU_State::dummy

Target for invalid value (SET of literal).

uint16_t DCPU_State::inst

Currently-executing instruction.

uint16_t DCPU_State::memory[MEM_SIZE]

The machine's memory.

uint16_t DCPU_State::o

Special registers.

uint16_t DCPU_State::registers[DCPU_REG_COUNT]

The registers, indexed by DCPU_Register.

unsigned char DCPU_State::skip

Signals that the next instruction is to be skipped due to IFx.

uint32_t DCPU_State::timer

Instruction-counter.

uint16_t * DCPU_State::val_b

Pointers at resolved values from current instruction, or NULL.
